it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is the top level controller. Its jobs are to create the model, to set observers and to start the game.
    Author:
    Marchingegno

      • Controller

        public Controller(GameConstants.MapType mapType,
                  java.util.Collection<VirtualView> virtualViews,
                  int skulls)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        mapType - the type of the map, chosen from one of the values in GameConstants.
        virtualViews - the VirtualViews of the players.
        skulls - the amount of skulls that the player chose to play with.
